Resignation Form

Date:{{ frappe.utils.format_datetime(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd-MM-yyyy") }}
From:
Name : {{doc.employee_name}}
Employee ID : {{doc.employee}}
Address : {{doc.address}}

To:
The Chief Executive Officer
KBL Services Ltd
Hafeeza Chambers
No. 111/3 (Old No. 74)
3rd Floor, A-Wing, K H Road
Bengaluru-560027

Dear Sir,

Sub: Resignation Letter.

*****

I wish to inform you that, I am resigning for the post {{doc.designation}} at KBL Services Ltd, due to {{doc.reason}}. Please treat {{doc.requested_relieving_date}} as my last working day in the company and I request you to accept my resignation.



Yours faithfully,


Signature


Name:
Date:
name: Resignation Form
